name: Sayonara no Mukougawa
overview: Kyōhei and Ayano were a happy couple and decided to get married. One month after their wedding Ayano died in a traffic accident. Two years have passed since. Kyōhei is taking care of Ayano's little sister and keeps contact with her other relatives and friends. He tries to move on with his life at home and at work. However, he in unsure as to how his romantic life will progress. At the time of crucial decisions he suddenly seems a woman on the street who looks like Ayano... Sayonara no Mukō-gawa is a visual novel. Despite its tragic premise, the game keeps a rather light-hearted tone and the story mostly focuses on Kyōhei's sexual encounters with the various female characters. The gameplay is nearly non-existing, with only a few instances of player's input during its course, all confined to selecting a room to visit in the house. Many of these choices make no difference and simply require the player to select the "right" one in order to trigger the next scene.
